",["$r","p",null,{"children":["渲染 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/style","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["内置的浏览器 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<style>"}]," 组件"]}]," 以向文档添加内联样式。可以在任何组件中渲染 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<style>"}],"，React 将在某些情况下将相应的 DOM 元素放置在文档头部，并对相同的样式进行去重。"]}],"

",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}],"：字符串，必需字段，表示样式表的内容。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"precedence"}],"：字符串，告诉 React 在文档 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<head>"}]," 中排列 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<style>"}]," DOM 节点的位置，确定哪个样式表可以覆盖另一个，可能的值包括（按优先级排序）",["$r","code",null,{"children":""reset""}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":""low""}],"、",["$r","code",null,{"children":""medium""}]," 与 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":""high""}],"。无论是 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<link>"}]," 还是内联 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<style>"}]," 标签，或者使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preload","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preload"}]}]," 或 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preinit","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preinit"}]}]," 函数加载的样式表，具有相同优先级的将一起处理。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}],"：字符串，允许 React ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"#special-rendering-behavior","children":["对 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}]," 相同的样式进行去重"]}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"media"}],"：字符串，将样式表限制为特定的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_media_queries/Using_media_queries","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"媒体查询"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"nonce"}],"：字符串，表示使用严格内容安全策略时允许资源的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/nonce","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"加密随机数"}],"。"]}],"

"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"不建议在 React 中使用的属性："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"blocking"}],"：字符串。如果指定为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":""render""}],"，指示浏览器在样式表加载之前不要渲染页面。React 使用 Suspense 提供了更精细的控制。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"special-rendering-behavior","children":"特殊的渲染行为 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["React 可以将 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<style>"}]," 组件移动到文档的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<head>"}]," 中，去重相同的样式表，并在样式表加载时 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react/Suspense","children":"挂起"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请提供 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"precedence"}]," 属性以选择此行为。如果样式表具有相同的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}],"，React 将对样式去重。优先级属性告诉 React 在文档的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<head>"}]," 中排列 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<style>"}]," DOM 节点的位置，从而确定哪个样式表可以覆盖另一个。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"这种特殊处理带来两个注意事项："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"在样式被渲染后，React 将忽略属性的更改（React 在开发环境中会对这种情况发出警告）。"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"即使渲染它的组件已被卸载，React 也可能将样式保留在 DOM 中。"}],"
"]}],"

",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"usage","children":"用法 "}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rendering-an-inline-css-stylesheet","children":"渲染一个内联 CSS 样式表 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果一个组件依赖于某些 CSS 样式以正确显示，可以在组件内部渲染一个内联样式表。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如果提供了 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"precedence"}]," 属性，组件将在样式表加载时挂起（即使是内联样式表，由于样式表引用的字体和图像，可能也会有加载时间）。",["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}]," 属性应该唯一地标识样式表，因为 React 将对 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"href"}]," 的样式表进行去重。"]}],"
",["$r","SandpackWithHTMLOutput",null,{"children":["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","meta":"src/App.js active","children":"import ShowRenderedHTML from './ShowRenderedHTML.js';
import { useId } from 'react';

function PieChart({data, colors}) {
  const id = useId();
  const stylesheet = colors.map((color, index) =>
    `#${id} .color-${index}: \{ color: "${color}"; \}`
  ).join();
  return (
    <>
      <style href={"PieChart-" + JSON.stringify(colors)} precedence="medium">
        {stylesheet}
      </style>
      <svg id={id}>
        …
      </svg>
    </>
  );
}

export default function App() {
  return (
    <ShowRenderedHTML>
      <PieChart data="..." colors={['red', 'green', 'blue']} />
    </ShowRenderedHTML>
  );
}
"}]}]}]]}]]
